articles.description: Akash dedicated his wonderful three-wicket haul to his father Ramji Singh, who died in 2015 after succumbing to paralysis. | Cricket
articles.content: India, still with a depleted batting lineup, were without their best bowler in the series, Jasprit Bumrah, as they headed into the fourth Test against England on Friday at the JSCA International Stad… [+3216 chars]
